content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here is a possible implementation of the function `extract_julia_code`:

```julia
using StringInterpolation

function extract_julia_code(md::String)::String
  # Split the markdown document into lines
  lines = split(md, "\n")

  # Initialize an empty string to store the julia code
  julia_code = ""

  # Iterate over the lines of the markdown document
  for line in lines
    # Check if the line contains a julia language code block
    if startswith(line, "`") && endswith(line, "`")
      # Extract the julia code from the line by removing the delimiters
      julia_code *= String(trim(line)[2:end-1])
    elseif startswith(line, "$") && endswith(line, "$")
      # Skip the code fences
      continue
    else
      # Join the lines with a newline if there are multiple julia code blocks
      if !isempty(julia_code)
        julia_code *= "\n"
      end
      # Add the line to the julia code
      julia_code *= line
    end
  end

  return julia_code
end
```
